title: Mac Issue - Unable to open LoL/Patcher
body:
Hey everyone,

Recently there's been an issue with players unable to open the LoL client on their Mac. Here are a few steps that may resolve the issue for you:

1) If you have recently upgraded to Yosemite (OSX 10.10), you may need to complete a fresh re-installation of League of Legends on the new 10.10 version.

2) Make sure that your connection is stable. If you are on wifi, disable this and connect directly to your router via wired Ethernet Cord. In addition, make sure to try all of the steps in our Connection Troubleshooting Guide.

3) Some players have reported that [this](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/8b0EJ8nP-mac-wont-open-dec-3-2014-fix) trick has succeeded in opening the client.

If you're still having issues I recommend that you lodge a support ticket [here](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/anonymous_requests/new).

LOL i just found the solution, works for me. this is from FatNinja12345  

This i am pretty sure is the windows instructions but just in case you guys arent too sure what i did was:
1. Go to System Preferences
2. Go to Network
3. Go to Advanced
4. Go to DNS
5. Press the plus button and add 8.8.8.8
6. Press the plus button and add 8.8.4.4
7. Press Ok
8. Press Apply.

Then try redownloading. worked for me.
